```{r}
library(scatterD3)
iris$url1 <- paste0("https://www.google.com?q=","iris setosa")
iris$url2 <- paste0("https://www.google.com?q=","iris versicolor") 
iris$url3 <- paste0("https://www.google.com?q=","iris virginica") 
iris$url<- c("iris$url1", "iris$url3", "iris$url2")
scatterD3(data=iris, 
          x=Petal.Length, 
          y=Sepal.Length, 
          col_var = Species, colors = c("Pink","Plum", "PowderBlue"),
          url_var=url)
```
